short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A toolbar for easily capturing content back to Architect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ARInsights Web Capture Addon makes it easy to capture and tag web content for inclusion into your ARchitect site as articles. Any web page can be captured at any time. You don't even need to be logged into ARchitect at the time. 

Whenever you are browsing on the Internet and discover important web content: (i.e. an article, document, or media quote)

1. Highlight any portion of the web page text. This text will become the summary in Architect
2. Click the web capture button.

The capture button loads the article capture page and pre-fills all of the available information about the current web page.  You can then easily associate the captured web page with any of ARchitect's analysts, assign coverages, rate the perception, and more.
